content.detailedDescription: One summer afternoon, i was outside of our home in western pennsylvania in the pittsburgh suburbs with my younger brother and our next door neighbor. i was about 14 years old at the time. it was midday with a clear blue sky with high puffy white clouds and good visibility. we all observed and object that looked almost like a piece of wood (like a 2 x 4) in color and shape. this object appeared to be about 5 to 7 feet long and it was revolving around it center axis in a horizontal plane. the revolutions were slow (maybe 8 to 10 per minute)and it was not making any sort of noise. there were no lights or any variations in it color or any sort of markings. the object appeared to be about 50 to 75 feet above the ground and well below any clouds in the sky. the object appeared without warning and moved in a straight line at a constant height above the ground. i would estimate it's speed at 10 to 12 miles per hour. we three boys found the object very strange and started to chase it to see what it might be. it it moved in a northeasterly direction and we vollowed it for several minutes until we got into some thicker woods and could no longer keep up with it's speed. we did not experience any adverse effects from this experience and there was no sense that the object detected our presence. we never heard anything more about this sighting and never saw it again. i have never talked to anyone that saw a similiar object at that time or since. i would like to know if this type of object has ever been reported by others or in the western pennsylvania region?
content.summary: Like a yellow piece of wood, no lights and no noise, 5 to 7 feet long

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home from working second shift.Just turned south onto fleetwood from freeland rd. i noticed what looked like a very large star(several times larger than a star), i then noticed it seemed to get to get brighter at that exact second it moved in a rather large j shape toward the horizen and then looked to slow down and flutter to near horizen and faded to black.

when i first noticed it seemed to look like large star

after i seen it i was totaly amazed that a shooting star could move like that. now not so sure that's possible. i have over my 50 years seen several unusual shooting stars. including several times, large shooting stars explode,once seen a shooting star skip several times across the sky and have seen shooting stars flutter to earth.

lost sight of object as faded to black near horizen
content.summary: Bright light in sky grew brighter and then moved much like shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting
12/8/2007 @ 6:30pm


in order to establish a foundation for the ufo sighting, i would like to establish the circumstances for the sighting.  my wife and i live in the southeastern section of indianapolis.  we have a business in nashville, in, about 45 miles south of indianapolis, in.  we take the same route to and back from nashville, using highway 135.  we���ve had our business in nashville for over two years now.  

during the winter hours, some days while driving back to indianapolis, it has already turned dark, depending on when we leave nashville.  we have never before, saw or looked for, anything unusual as our minds are never focused on ufos but ordinary business concerns or listening to talk radio.  

this evening, not unlike many evenings in central indiana during the early winter, it was dark and raining.  there was a fair amount of traffic in both directions and it is a two lane highway.  as we were driving north toward indianapolis, at about 20 miles south of indianapolis, a few miles south of bargersville, off to our left, about 800 to 1000 feet west of us and about the same distance in the sky, we suddenly noticed a extremely bright, flashing strobe-like light, flashing about once a second in the dark rainy sky.  my first thought and comment to marilyn was that it must be one of those microwave towers as i knew that a few miles ahead near bargersville, they had some microwave towers that we���ve observed during the daylight hours.  

as we were driving northward on h135 about 60 mph, we soon approached the east side of the flashing light which was now directly west of us about 800 to 1000 feet in the sky and probably that far west of us.  however, instead of us passing it, it appeared to start pacing us at about the same speed.  there were no colored lights, just the one rather large, extremely bright strobe-type light that was bluish-white.   it was so extra bright that when it was flashing, it lit up everything on the ground in the direction of the object.  i was driving so i could only glance at the flashing object for a split second but marilyn was able to watch it for perhaps 30 seconds or more.  as she became more excited and astonished at what she was witnessing, the flashing object suddenly turned off to the left, heading west and disappeared.  

while we were really puzzled as to what it was, i didn���t consider stopping at the time because of the traffic behind me and no real place to pull over.  it was only after this short experience that we were forced to conclude that it may have been a ufo because of the special characteristics of object.  we have concluded that it was flying too show to be an airplane and didn���t seem to behave like a helicopter.  this will remain a mystery for us.
content.summary: A large, extremely bright, flashing, strobe-like, light

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were camping in the backyard of my parents home, when i woke up at about 0300 sweating from the heat. i went into the house for some water and then went back to the tent. i looked to the north and saw what was a battle going on. i knew i was not dreaming because i just came from the house. 
it looked like there were many objects exploding and shooting at each other. i watched this for about 15 minutes in awe, as i could not believe what i was seeing. better them than us, i remember thinking.
back to sleep.
again i say, "if i can remember this for 30 years, it happened."
content.summary: While camping  observed a battle in the sky to the north.

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 10yo living in gahanna, ohio. my girlfriend and i were riding our bicycles around 2100 hours and had just turned around @ the dead end of our street.
from what i remenber,for no reason i happened to turn my head to the left and looked up. there sitting above the telephone wires was a very long (dark gray or black in color)cigar shaped object which had colored lights on the bottom. there was no noise, not a sound. we just looked at each other and took off without looking back. we were so scared.
when we got to my house, a cup of cocoa was in order. cocoa fixes everything when you are a kid.
i believe anything that one remembers for almost 50yrs, that scares the crap out of you, is factual and did occur. i will never forget this.
i will be submitting two more sightings.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object with colored lights hovering above telephone wires

content.detailedDescription: My husb and i were star-gazing around time of perseids, a few days before the peak night, and were sitting on a power dam on the rogue river.  it was between 2 and 3 am.  we were struck by some pulsing lights in the sky as we walked from our rv to the river.  those lights were unexplainable: we were approximately 45 miles from nearest city (medford, or.)  as we sat at the dam and talked about stars and the weird lights we noticed two lights coming towards us from down river, from the southwest, which was also seemingly the area of the pulsing lights, which were no longer occuring.  it took approximately 3-5 minutes and to me appeared to be coming directly at us, as if looking for us.  i should have mentioned that there were wispy, thin, clouds over the entire sky, although the stars were still slightly visible.  the object flew towards us slowly and then stopped directly overhead, and the two lights brightened distinctly as if looking directly at us.  they remained brightened for about 10-15 seconds, and then dimmed to original strength.  i then saw what appeared to be another object, exactly like the first, continue on original path, northeast, and sumultaneously, the first one did a quick, very quick, zig zag like move toward the east and disappeared.  my husband did not see second object, but agreed that first object moved too quickly and with agility we had never seen, or heard of, in human vehicles.
content.summary: Object flew towards us, hovered, flashed two lights as if looking at us, flew away very quickly

content.detailedDescription:
We were in punta gorda, fl for the winter in 2004. one night in march (can't remember the date).  i went out on the lanai (screened in porch)about 10:00 p.M. to check to see in the door was locked before i went to bed.  i looked up at the sky and i saw a rectangular flying object with lights and there was an orb outlining it when the lights were flashing -- when the lights went out, i couldn't see anything until the flashing came back on.  these two flying objects came from the north and then turned and went south.  i watched them until they went over the horizon.

i mentioned this to my neighbor the next day and she said, "oh, those are just the jets flying into the ft. myers airport.  they couldn't have been jets -- 1) the lights were rectangular in shape and flashed off and on with an outline light around them; and 2) punta gorda is only 20 miles north of ft. myers and those objects were way too high in the sky for preparing to land only 20 miles away.

i watched these 2 objects until i couldn't see them anymore.  i could not hear any noise.  but i know one thing, they were not jet planes.

i heard mr. friedman on coast-to-coast am the other night and i thought i'd report this sighting even though it's been a few years ago.

sincerely,
kay letizia
grannykayletizia@yahoo.Com
content.summary: Saw 2 ufo's -- one following the other

content.detailedDescription: I was camping out with my brother and a friend. it was school holidays. our campsite was on the south side of preces point, our position approximately 36 degrees 46'43.68" s  175 degrees 29'31.84" this put us facing away from coromandel township. it was dusk. we had just collected wood from the beach and lit the campfire at the eastern end of the beach. we made conversation as we sat by the newly lit fire. we had been going to our homes during the daytime and returning to campsite in the late afternoon. our friend asked my brother and i if we had seen the story in the newspaper about the gisborne    (nz) farmer who was disturbed by lights in the night at his farm, he shot at them etc, and they took off - or similar words were used. my brother and i said "no" our father does not get the newspaper. one of us then (not me) joked - "look there's a ufo over there" - or very similar words were used. he pointed to a dim light across the mudflats - the tide had been going out. this light was about 1km east south east of us. we giggled about this.... 'of course it was not a ufo'. we speculated that the lights were from a light aircraft as we knew that there was a grass landing strip across the mudflats and we envisioned a cessna of something having just landed or was preparing for takeoff. as it got darker and the group of lights -some flashing, some constant - looked less like an airplane as we know it and we discussed a faint dome shape slightly above the lights but apparently slightly detached from them as i remember it. we debated the possibility that it was not an aircraft. i remember saying that "if it's an  airplane that has landed, wouldn't the pilot have switched off the lights  by now and gone home" and "if he was going to take off, wouldn't he have done it by now?". there was no noise. we were also discussing three separate lights which were not visible when we first saw the first light(s). these lights were to the north of the original light and were single white lights about the same intensity as a street light (although there were no street lights around at the time - probably aren't today either). i felt that they were also about the same height as a street light would be- and they were about 700 meters away initially. my brother began to ridicule myself and my friend over our continued interest in these strange lights. but we remained curious, particularly as they  seemed more unusual as the sky grew darker. repeatedly, leaving my brother behind, we walked out onto the mudflats to get a closer look and a wider angle look  than what was available at the campfire. walking out onto the mudflats allowed us to somewhat see past a small hill at the eastern end of our beach where we had set up camp. over time we noticed that the three small   'street light like' lights were making their way towards us (via the shoreline) while the original group of lights stayed put. we also observed on our second trip out on the mudflats, that when a car went by on the quiet country road behind where the lights were, they'd all dim out to such a point that you could no longer see them unless you had never taken your eyes off them. as such a car then drew away into the distance again, the lights grew back to their original strengths. we made our way back to campfire to tell my brother of our observations. he eventually reluctantly came out onto the mudflats to get a full view. he made the observation that: yes indeed the three smaller lights were making their way towards us. we were  able to demonstrate the truth about how all lights dimmed as a car drove by than grew back to strength as the car drew away. when he saw these things for himself he had a change of tone: "it's time to get out of here" or similar words. we ran across the mudflats. threw sand on the fire,  grabbed our push bikes and began to run up the hill to the main track  running from east to west along preces point. our imaginations allowed us to believe that "they" might be able to detect metal - so we ditched our push bikes. we got to the main track and ran about 50 - 100 meters eastwards. enough  to get us to a clear view of what we'd been looking at from on the mudflats, but also a clear view of the other side of the small hill that was  just to the east of our original camp fire. from here we could see where the original light(s) were. but they were there no more. i felt the three smaller lights also should be visible, going by where they were when we decided to flee. they were not there either, at least not in the same shape. what we saw from the top of the hill and almost straight below us about 30 - 60 meters away was a large white circular light, with clearly defined edges that did not seem to illuminate anything around it. it was glowing creamy white and had a matrix pattern across the top of it. the pattern was formed by areas that were not quite so brightly illuminated as the rest of the object. overall the matrix formed diamond like shapes that were not so large at the edges of the sphere / disk as they were towards the center of it (we were looking down on it). the total area was the size of a small house. beside this, and i guess about 7 meters from the big light were two other objects. they were almost rectangular in shape and were standing vertically along their long edge. they were rectangular except that they had 45 degree features at their four corners. they also had a diamond like pattern although it was consistent in size across their entire surface. the light that they emitted was consistent in colour and character to that of the larger round disk like / sphere like light except that they were pulsating. going on and off in synchronous with one another  except that when one was on the other was off. we looked at this all   and discussed what were seeing. it seemed like we could just stay here forever  and just watch what we saw! we talked about all the detail mentioned above and we contemplated throwing a rock on the disk like object. this  idea was rejected. we eventually fled the scene holding hands. days later  we saw news of the kaikoura coast(nz)ufo sightings which i understand got 5 minutes  on cbs world news.
content.summary: Saw initial light(s) joked about it. became more interesting looking as the dusk became night.

content.detailedDescription:
Disc shaped silver object floating and going in small circles over avila bay, no windows and i did not see it until it was pointed out by two employees of avila beach resort!

i am a wedding dj who was doing a wedding reception for about 200 people at avila beach resort in a large tent. i went out the side door of the tent to ask when the buffet would start and as i went around the outside of the tent employees of the the avila beach resort asked me what is that as they were pointing to the sky, i looked up and i viewed a disc shaped object floating in the sky. i viewed this object for about 7 minutes trying to figure out what it was? i returned to the wedding reception as i needed to continue playing music, the wedding photographer was doing a slide show and i could not bother him to take photos. i believe this to be a no fly zone and expected to hear jet's (i did not hear any)
content.summary: Ufo over avila bay , california near diablo canyon power plant

content.detailedDescription:
I was studying late as usual just leaving my gallery walking around back heading home. a light & in the night sky looking to the n. just e. of st. route 68 2:45 am 10-10-07 approx. grabbed my attention. i ignored it first 5 seconds. compelled again to look, strange feeling now i began to get about it.
i again walked on though late tired. now no longer able to ignore it.

the moving light at first i thought was a plane now over the state rt. 68 more so directly over the information center for "yellow springs" just back of "peache's bar & grill" as you enter our little village. the light was entering the village.

it then became extemely clear i was looking at a "triangular ufo" as it tilted side  and was to clear to see it's shape.
just inside each rounded corner was a bright white light round. 15% the size of the craft
inside the very center a large red light very bright very distinct clear same size as the white lights.

it hovered a bit moved slowly over "ha ha pizza's" side still more over back of "glenn helen the nature preserve" here 100 sq acre's sacred to the indians here prior. & a portal acording to an edgar cayce reading here . one of 123 total he loved the energy here.

the triangular appeared for a glimpse of a second to move directly toward me quickly bright light also!
i paniced a bit, shuffled around back forth, not sure which way to go.
get a camera, hollered some, come out,  "ufo ufo ufo  right here , right now". it drifted west to east now over toward the glenn. i lost sight & was forced to run back around the frame gallery, to my art gallery right across from the glenn. it had crossed route 68 slowing floating effortlessly silently over the tree tops bright as football field lights, crisp!

i realized too late for camera in my place & pleaded with the two neighbors who lived above to come out & look as they were at the sidewalk level. they walked around & they saw it.

they will verify all from the time it was above the glenn & disappeared over it 10- 15 seconds max crisp clear triangular all lite up !!!

i noticed on a subsequent ufo show the exact artist's drawing of it, i believe it also was ohio  into ill.
exciting, sureal & the mystery goes on right here a stone's throw from wright patterson airforce base where the famed "hanger 18" is & the "f.T.D. building". foreign technology building, supposedly where other nations tech. was reversed engineered as well as the classic "rosewell" craft & alien bodies.
peace
content.summary: Triangular   white lights inside each corner & bright red light in the  center

content.detailedDescription: i was in standing in driveway having a cigerette this was about 11:00 pm .I looked up and observed shooting star (white in color )streak across the star lit night sky from east to west.Size was much bigger than back ground stars(like a big comet).I figured it to be a comet/meteor.It crossed as fast as a normal comet and then just dissappeared like as if exiting the atmostsphere. any further to my west my view would be somewhat obstructed by a tree. but then from behind the tree beginning from same trajectory it dissapeared the light reappeared this time  streaking a south trajectory and dissapeared. with a slight white yellow color.Then it reappeared again for the third time now on a northwest trajectory.All three times it streaked as fast as one would see a comet .To the right of this activity  i also observed two seperate green and white lights appear parrallel to each other to my west and make very short streaks westerly and disappear. there was 2 aircraft approaching on a southwest heading. i could hear they were jet aircraft.The jet's speed in comparison was like observing a small prop. plane moving across sky,nothing even close to to the speed of the light i witnessed .As clear a night  as it was those two aircraft had a perfect view of what i witnessed.Eventually more jets came in on same basic heading as the others.The first 2 planes were approaching at same time these events happened and were in close proximity.I have been witness to alot of meteor showers at night but none of multiple trajectory!.I never heard or read a report of anyone else spotting this that next day..The first part of sighting appeared from east from the big dipper and yellow star to west  towards little dipper and dissapeared just past little dipper.[sky were clear,temp. 61 degrees,winds calm,humidity 88%,event between 11:00pm and 11:15pm dec.3,07.There is a bombing range east southeast of this location and im very used to watching military fighter craft do manuevers day and night.This is not that!Could you check airport out of ocala to see if they monitered it on radar.Municipal airport.Thanks mike
content.shape: Fireball,  Flash,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Shooting star like with multiple trajectory.Speed matching.White/yellow. 2 aircraft in vacinityclear sky /night

content.detailedDescription: while working at my local supermarket for the past 6 months i have learned that up to 6 p.D.Q. employees have been subject to unidentified ariel phonomena, one of whom just had her 2nd sighting. you may find up to 4 of these employees working in the deli on any given day which would on some days make up the entire deli staff. a local jacuzzi cleaner by the name of jeff hacket who comes into the store also claims to have seen ufos and has interest in the phonomena having loaned me a high quality vhs on ufos. i will be collecting drawings and brief descriptions from each eyewitness and faxing them to you shortly.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Typical saucer shape, small no more than 15 feet accross. no windows, no swastikas, no exhaust and no movement. when i stopped the truck to get a better look it disappeared!

content.detailedDescription:
During the east coast blackout in the summer of '73 i went up on the roof
of the building to look around. this building was "abandoned" but fortified (by me)and located at 621 east 9th street, nyc, between avenues b and c. the
roof was 100' by 80'. the two craft had no surface features, and glowed
dull orange. they seemed to be over the power station at avenue d and fourteenth street and about four hundred feet in diameter, with one being
about one third smaller than the other, or more distant. i walked around on the roof to try to judge size and position as best i could. there was another person with me. the objects just stayed up there with no motion until after i left. i felt calm and unexcited. i thought they were the "astral paramecia" type of ufo. i stayed up there about a half hour, and then went to bed.



there was no indication of lost time or direct contact. this was the only time i ever saw a ufo, though i always believed they existed, and have read a few books about them.
content.summary: 2 dull orange illuminated spheres over powerstation  in blackout

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work heading north on us-127. i had just passed the business 127 exit and noticed a formation of planes ahead that seemed to come out of no where. as i got closer to it, i slowed down and rolled my window down. the formation was also heading north just parallel to the interstate. 

the formation of planes appeared to be flying very slow. still heading north on us-127 and just past broomfield road, i went directly under it. it was not a formation of planes. it was a very large black triangle. i actually saw the shape and texture of it. it was about the size of a football field or bigger. it was approximately 400-600 feet off the ground. it made no sound that i could hear.  

it had faint white lights on each corner as well as brighter red lights on each corner. the red light at the front of it was flashing as if a strobe light in a weird sequence of blinks. almost like morse code. 

when i got out of work in the morning, it was beginning to get light out. i remembered the exact location that i saw the object the previous night. lo and behold, there was something in the sky at the exact location. this time it was much higher. it was barely moving. 

it was hard to tell the shape of it. it had faint blue lights, and three very bright white lights. the middle white light was flashing just as the red light did the night before. it made no sound that i could hear.
content.summary: Very large black triangle with red and white lights seen at night, seen again in morning with blue and white lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I had fallen asleep one night in the summer and had at that time had a big interest in ufo's.  as i slept, i suddenly felt awakened by some strange feeling and sound.  it was early around 1:00 a.M.  as i laid in my bed i felt a numb feeling as though i couldn't move.  i thought i was having some kind of seizure but i wasn't.  i struggled to move but couldn't.  after a while i managed to get to my knees and look out the window.  i saw a large object hoveing above the ground in the back yard(about 2 feet above the ground).  i saw several lights blinking on and off around it's edge in the colours of purple, orange, white and yellow.  the object was silver in colour with no obvious windows.  
i thought i was dreaming and laid back down.  however, i woke again about an hour after the experience and felt as though my experience was real.  i was afraid to look out the window.  
i knew that the experience had been real regardless of who believed me.
content.summary: A  large object disk shaped with multiple coloured lights around it's perimiter

content.detailedDescription: This object was sighted by myself and my neighbor as we were outside on a cold january night playing with my telescope.  i was living near the airport in ottawa at the time.  we were playing with the telescope stand when a large cigar shaped object suddenly lit up above us (green in colour).  it moved through the sky at a slow speed and then suddenly faded gradually out of sight.  it then lit up again gradually after several miles and continued moving along.  it continued in this pattern until it went beyond our sight.  we called the air traffic control people at the airport to see if they had seen it but to no avail.
content.summary: A cigar shaped object fading in and out (lighting)

content.detailedDescription:
Dec 5, 2007

i was taking a break outside on our back porch and gazing up at a mostly blue sky with a few thin cloud formations a few miles off to the southeast.  the cloud formation was  fairly low, perhaps 2,000 feet off the ground.  

i noticed the cloud formation appeared oddly shaped.   there was a semi circle of clear blue sky cut right through the middle.  the swath of blue sky appeared to be at least 20-30 feet wide and the diameter was approximately ��� mile.  it resembled someone taking a paint brush and painting the blue sky semi-circle through the thin layer of cloud.  i was wondering what could cause it and it was a fairly windy day.

i noticed what at first appeared to be a plane approximately 200 feet below the cloud layer moving steadily off to the west.  from my position it appeared somewhat large for a plane at that distant.  i mean it would have taken a softball sized object to obscure it from my view.  that would make it appear at least 4 inches long from my position.   i would estimate the object being 75-100 ft long.   

since it looked out of place/oddly shaped, i concentrated on it for a few seconds.  it was a metallic in color that shown brightly in the afternoon sun.  it gave off no noise nor did it display a vapor trail. it had what appeared to be a rudder both forward and aft.   

since it was moving steadily to the west, it was moving out of sight due to the roof overhang.  i got up from my chair and walked about 6 feet down the steps to get a more prolonged, clear, view.  there was nothing but clear blue sky in the direct the object was moving.  when i got down the steps (only about 5 seconds later) the object was gone!  i mean if it had been a plane it would surely be flying steadily west toward the afternoon sun.  

what was real odd was the cloud with the semi-circle and the fact the object disappeared from its fairly slow flight into clear blue sky.
content.summary: Mettalic in color, shaped like a cigar with a large rudder near each end

content.detailedDescription: While relaxing on our boat (no drinking)i noticed a perfectly spherical object moving quite rapidly in a north-westerly direction. rockland county is one the western bank of the hudson river, and westchester county is on the eastern bank along with westchester county airport. corporate jets and smaller commercial airliners very frequently move in a westerly take off pattern, so we are quite accustomed to seeing fast moving objects in the sky.  this one was unlike any others we had ever seen.  it was matte black,(it actually appeared to be a total lack of color, rather than just black,) was perfectly round and moving at what i would estimate was approximately 300 knots.  there were no lights. protrusions, sound or any visible exhaust.  it's speed, altitude, attitude and direction never varied. the day was bright and sunny with a few white clouds at varying heights.  we watched it till it disappeared over the horizon. my wife(lori) and i discussed the event, and neither one of us could figure out what the object was.  if i had to guess at the obects altitude, i would say it was at approximately 5000 feet.
content.summary: Wife and i witnessed unusual event in the sky while at the dock in the cockpit of our boat

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside one night with my wife we were at my mothers house on the outskirts of little rock smoking a cigarette. i happened to look up as i am always aware of my surroundings, my wife and i noticed a strange object flying fairly low almost right above the tree tops it was. this object was almost gliding across the sky and as i recall it had a total of 4 visible lights on the bottom of it....3 of the lights were identical and on one was on each of the corners of the triangle they appeared to be similar to landing lights but with a strange glow to them, and were definately not flares as i was an infantryman for the us army and have extensive knowledge of flares. in the middle of this object was a sort of blueish circle/bubble and to the naked eye it seemed somewhat distorted almost a blur. the object proceeded in a straight line over the tree line, across the front yard and then over our heads and then over the house with only a faint roaring noise which could have been from commercial jets or some kind of fighter jet from lrafb, i have noticed more and more reports within the last few years from arkansas and firmly believe that it was man made and not of alien origin....My theory is and will be until proven otherwise that perhaps the 1947 case was a downed/crashed ufo from another world and was then reverse engineered by our government in secret, and i believe now that the government has at least 3 to 4 different models of these strange craft and have had since the early to mid 1950s, i was in the military as an infantryman and have worked under "sierra" (secret) conditions with the m1126 (stryker) in developmental stages and the land/mounted warrior program which the army claims to have killed yet my buddies in iraq are the only unit in the army that possess this technology and are actively using it? government cover ups are a real thing and always will be. i unfortunately have no photos of this object as it was a rather quick event and my wife and i just sort of couldn't take our eyes off of this magnificent object. i have chosen to remain anonymous because i do not wish to be persecuted by the army for disclosing certain info contained herein. however this website admin is free to contact me.
content.summary: Triangular object with 3 smaller lights on bottom corners and one larger in middle.

content.detailedDescription:
I was deer hunting on opener, nov 3rd near brainerd on a friends acerage just east of lower south long lake. i just climbed into my 18 foot stand on the edge of a 20 acre field looking nw. i got settled to wait for sun up and noticed the object. at first i thought it was just some parking lights from maybe a real tall light pole but it moved up and down slowly approximatly 500 feet above the trees or horizon from my position. it was a shinny cylinder on top, disc around the base and appeared to have 2 or 3 large super bright jets directly under the disc. it was rotating at approx 1 hz with a black spot on the cylinder. no id lights of any kind. through my 30 06 9x scope i could see the features more clearly. it hovered for 10 minutes (up and down a bit) then it drifted off slowely to the north out of site after another 10 minutes. the drifting had elevation changes to it. not sure how much due to the distance. no other aircraft were seen during this event.

i could not believe that i was seeing another object in or near the location as my last report investigated by mufon mn! i was so disapointed it did not drift my way! and again, no digital recorder?
content.summary: Bright rotating object about 5 miles out with brillient jets under, hovering

content.detailedDescription: It was pretty much a full moon around 10 pm last july.It was a clear,warm night and i was in the backyard of the property. i was looking at the moon and i just got this feeling that something was else there.I stared at it for about 5 minutes wondering what might be hiding behind the brightness of the moon.(ok,a very strong feeling).I noticed a bright light off to the upper left it didn't move so i thought it might be a planet. i grabbed my trusty olympus d-560 zoom and turned off the flash was quite suprised when i took it to the digital processing kiosk at a local rite- aid .Pretty interesting "planet"? what really got me was the large object on the lower left.The pics are as close asi could zoom so you willstill need a magnifying glass to get the total effect here.
content.summary: It was unseen until i printed and enlarged it, but i knew something was there!!!

content.detailedDescription:
Today is 06-11-07, yesterday i watched a programm (on history channel) on ufos then i do reporting to mufon.
i known this event from last 4yrs, first event was occured in july 2003, i had a personal home laboratory, and have keen interest in making mu personal telescope to watch night sky. one night i saw a flying object.
initially i think that this is nothing may an aircraft not making sound. but when this objects rounds of my village several times within the time on an hour then i surprised that this may be somthing else. then i took my friends devendra, kamlendra and suryakant to see this object. we all are post graduate in various fields. we r surprised that this objects blinking lights its shape is.........Two parallel long rods are interconnected by two bridges. one rode blinking with red light and another with green. 
then we all think that.. 
1. if this is an aircraft or man made thing how this object stop suddenly in air during taking turn and sharply back on to the same path from which it has come.
2. no sound
3. our village as far i know, not in any air force zone.
4. there r most of the people are so poor have no money to purchase so costly flying toys if it is a toy.
5. why it was wandering over village, this is not a well known village.
6. at the last of this event this object goen to forest and fall down.
since then there were so many times i have seen this event in the same way from last 4 years.
last i seen this in august 2007, me n my wife and suryakant were with me.
now i am doing ph.D microbiology and my wife  m.Sc microbiology, n suryakant is b.Sc math, physics chemistry.
last time we all seen that this object was flying over the forest of our village. this was the rainy season and lightining in clouds was there. in the background of lightining clouds this object was seen clearly from approx. 500-600 meter distance. shape was not so clear, but it must be an object have a size. next day it again seen 9:30 pm then it comes very close to the village and as ever wandering over the village.
now i am going to purchase a digital camera then will took some clear photographs then i will send some pictures to mufon.
thanks
arvind
content.summary: A slowly flying cylinderical object, no sound, take breaks in air and moves back, blinking lights, approx 70-100 meter height from ground, takes several round of my village

content.detailedDescription: i was giving my dogs their nightly walk. i like to look up into the sky, since florida's sky is beautiful and clear and many stars are present. i saw shooting stars in the past month and hoping to see another while looking into the sky on a very clear night around 9:30 pm, a green orb went into the sky and vanished.While watching the orb, i thought "how pretty" and waited to hear a noise as i thought it was a firework. it made no sound, and the orbs colors didn't run or fade or trail as a firework would have. no one was around.The sky was completly silent. the orb kept its size and shape. it went up then curved forward and disappeared. i know it wasn't a firework and i have no other answer to as what it could be. the orb moved faster as it curved, before it disappeared. almost like "up, up and away"..Basiclly it levatated up, then forward.
content.summary: Green orb that went up into sky at a curve and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Hi i work in a dealership where i sell new and used cars,when i took this picture i never noticed anything unusual but upon looking back over this i noticed something unusual at the top of the picture.The photo was taken at about 2pm in newbridge co kildare.
content.summary: Ufo in top of photo i took at garage where i work

content.detailedDescription:
Sir first of all this is not a false report from me 
sir one night  on the described day i saw a point like object moving across the sky it was just kije a star(not starshape) but small point like object
it moved little fast and disapperared by seeing that i could quess that it was at an enormous height  and furthermore i ve seen like this more than 3to 4 times   i dont claim that is the ufo but i am interested to know what it is
content.summary: Slowly moving point like object

content.detailedDescription: The photo is one of 5 taken on my night trail camera, if you are interested i will send more to you.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Cone,  Oval,  Sphere
content.summary: Night camera photo

content.detailedDescription:
It was a cold and  overcast day . nov.21, 2007 at 1:50 pm . i was returning home from deer hunting in the pierre-marquette forest.
while traveling n. on 140th ave. approximately 1/4 mil before reaching 19 mile road.
i had just crested a hill in an open area of hay fields, when i noticed  directly in front of me and about a mile away,  what could best be described as a huge strangely illuminated ,glowing, triangular object in the sky just below the cloud ceiling. the outer perimeters of which appeared to be illuminated (mixture of pale, satiny white, greyish white,  ) with the center of the object semi  transparent and the same color as the sky. it actually looked like the sky was in the center of the triangle somehow.  (like a glowing  pool ball rack)

the object was moving from west to east, and was only visible for a few seconds . i had to accelerate to get past a tree line in hopes of catching a glimpse of it again. i turned east onto 19 mile road and did not view it again until i reached an area of open power lines. at which time i only caught a glimpse of it .  i first overshot the power lines and had to brake and reverse to catch  a fleeting  glimpse as the rearmost  section of the craft  was swallowed up by the clouds. i could not hear any sounds but my truck was running at the time.

i was shocked by the size of this object and my first thought was of possibly  some sort of object crashing into the earth. but quickly realized it was on a level trajectory and appeared to be under power. 
i must admit i was quite shocked and upset by what i had seen and tried to notify someone but kept getting recordings etc. so my brother who also had a sighting many years ago suggested i notify mufon while it was still fresh in my memory.
content.summary: I observed a huge glowing triangle in the sky below the cloud ceiling.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just arrived at home and went outside to start up the grill and noticed helicopter noise to the southwest. i looked up and saw a helicopter about 1 mile away, between my home and the i-17 highway. i figured there was probably traffic or an accident and went inside to change. i went back outside with a tray of chicken and looked up at the helicopter again, except this time there was a bright triangular object hovering in the sky between the helicopter and my home. it was equal length on all sides and appeared to emit a strong yellow light. it was about the same size as the helicopter. it appeared to be at about the same altitude as the helicopter if not a bit higher. as i blinked several times to make sure i wasn't seeing things, it slowly rotated 90 degrees in place to face due west without a change in altitude. it then moved very slowly for about 2 seconds and then shot off at a rate of speed impossible to comprehend and disappeared. there was no vapor trail. there was no sound. the entire time the only sound i heard was coming from the helicopter. i have not reported this before for fear of ridicule as i am a doctor. i also know a thing or two about planes because my father used to be a pilot. i used to work just outside of luke afb and can tell you with 100% certainty that what i saw was not a military craft. it was not a plane, blimp, weather baloon, bird, hot air baloon, or helicopter. i am hoping that maybe someone else saw what i saw, maybe even the people in the helicopter, and post something regarding this incident.
i felt like i was in complete disbelief when i saw the object. when it rotated in place i realized i was not looking at anything i have ever seen before and probably will never see again. i really wish someone else had been there with me to witness this phenomenon. i've told several people, mostly close friends and family, and the majority of them are fascinated by the story. but there are some who don't believe me, which i find upsetting because no reasonable, rational adult would make something like this up.
content.summary: Bright triangular light with extraordinary speed

content.detailedDescription: It was a bright intense light from an area in the arizona desert on the gunery ranges outside of luke afb.  i was a security policeman stationed at luke,  we were assigned to protect the gun ranges outside of gila bend south to the mexican border.  we were so far removed from civilization and any highways that it could not have been a vehicle and it was not a conventional aircraft.  the light was at near ground level, shinned at us for about a minute and then shot up into the air and then vanished.
content.summary: Bright intense light
